TextLibrary.Text: Call her by her name, General - Beta Prime.
Call her by her name, General - Beta Prime.
Think of her as an asset, young man. It makes it easier.
Think of her as an asset, young lady. It makes it easier.
She's already on board your ship.
She's already on board your ship.
Good. You're an excellent pilot and an inspiring leader. Trident has released funds for you to purchase your own Battleship. One million credits have been placed at your disposal.
Good. You're an excellent pilot and an inspiring leader. Trident has released funds for you to purchase your own Battleship. One million credits have been placed at your disposal.
